The possibilities are enormous. #Zeronet will expand the internet through creative Mesh networking and other modalities. Creative distributed data storage etc..üëçüòÄ

I'm not a racist either. But once again the world and especially Europe has a big Jewish problem. The (((Jews))) are the ones behind the mass invasion of Europe. Many have infiltrated your governments and pushed for uncontrolled mass migration. It's a distraction. They have done this many times throughout history with catastrophic consequences. WWI and WWII that horribly killed over a 100 million was in large part caused by Jewish treachery, treason and manipulations. The Bolshevik revolution was the result of the writings and subversive influence and meddling of Jew idiots like Carl Marx, Lennon and Trotsky (mental masturbator's). As a result of their corrupt stupidity they brought Stalin to power who killed over 40 million Russians. Nazism was in large part a reaction to Nasi-sm ("Nasi" is a Hebrew word for Jewish Prince!). The Jews want to distract from their theft and genocide in historic Palestine. They want to turn the holy lands into the ultimate perverse giant theme park, and charge the world for access and salvation. This past disgrace was the exact thing for which God in the countenance of Jesus Christ threw the money changers out of the temple for (cleansed the Temple), and disinherited the Jews. (((Jews))) are an evil malevolent cult. Europe must push back hard. Celebrate, support and encourage their own beautiful cultures, societies and race. Europeans represent the pinnacle of the civilized world, order, civility, rationality. It's a state of being the disordered psychopathic mind of the criminal (((Jew))) hates, and wants to destroy. The deranged always seek to destroy. That's my analysis. :-)

@Swastika: The Holocaust was the 80 to 100 million that died horrible deaths in WWII. A war precipitated and caused by the (((Jew))) The Holocaust was not the tiny percentage of (((Jews))) who died. As usual, the Jews scammed the world. But the internet is helping get the truth out, and the (((Jews))) house of cards is falling HARD! (((Jews))) are the only creatures I know of stupid enough to think they can fuck with God and get away with it..
